item.title: CVC 计划在 Zabka 上市，进行 2021 年以来最大的华沙首次公开募股
item.description: CVC Capital Partners Plc 正计划对 Zabka Polska SA 进行首次公开募股，这可能是波兰至少三年来最大的首次股票出售。【原文：CVC Capital Partners Plc is planning an initial public offering in Zabka Polska SA in what could be Poland’s biggest first-time share sale in at least three years.】

item.title: 菲律宾股市将因降息前景迎来牛市
item.description: 菲律宾基准股指上涨，有望在美国和东南亚国家进一步放宽货币政策的前景下进入牛市。【原文：The Philippines’ benchmark stock index gained, poised to enter a bull market on the prospects of further monetary policy easing in the US and in the Southeast Asian nation.】

item.title: 拜登与莫迪宣布印度新建半导体工厂计划
item.description: 美国和印度就在这个南亚国家建立半导体制造厂达成了合作协议，从而推动了印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）促进该国制造业发展的努力。【原文：The US and India reached an agreement to work together on setting up a semiconductor fabrication plant in the South Asian nation, giving a boost to Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s efforts to bolster manufacturing in the country.】

item.title: 法国央行行长支持巴尼耶推动向富人征税
item.description: 法国央行行长弗朗索瓦-维勒鲁瓦-德-加尔豪（Francois Villeroy de Galhau）对新政府提出的向富人和大公司征税以缓解公共财政紧张的建议表示支持。【原文：Bank of France Governor Francois Villeroy de Galhau put his weight behind the new government’s proposals to tax the wealthy and large companies to bring urgent relief to stretched public finances.】

item.title: 摩根大通称全球企业热衷于通过并购和首次公开募股在印度发展
item.description: 摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：Global companies and financial sponsors are keen to keep exploring both mergers and acquisitions and initial public offerings as they seek to tap into the country’s economic growth, according to top executives from JPMorgan Chase & Co.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市在经历六周来最糟糕的一天后有望上涨
item.description: 伦敦证券交易所。摄影师：Hollie Adams/Bloomberg【原文：The London Stock Exchange. Photographer: Hollie Adams/Bloomberg】

item.title: 速报采购经理人指数显示：2024年印度经济扩张速度最慢
item.description: 汇丰控股有限公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）的一项即时调查显示，由于服务业和制造业均出现下滑，2024 年印度经济活动的增长速度最为疲软。【原文：India’s economic activity grew at the weakest pace in 2024 following a drop in both services and manufacturing sector, a flash survey by HSBC Holdings Plc showed.】

item.title: 英国一项小型研究发现 Covid 导致持续性认知缺陷
item.description: 故意感染冠状病毒的健康青壮年并没有发现任何认知方面的影响，但他们的考试成绩却显示了相反的情况。【原文：The healthy young adults deliberately infected with the coronavirus didn’t notice any cognitive effect, but their test scores showed otherwise.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事欧洲
item.description:
及时了解市场监测情况

Get up to speed with what the markets are monitoring

】

item.title: 在廉价航空价格战中，卖空者瞄准威兹航空
item.description: 随着消费者缩减开支，旅游前景变得暗淡，做空者押注一家廉价航空公司的表现将不如欧洲同行。【原文：With the outlook for travel weakening as consumers pull back on spending, short sellers are betting that one budget airline will fare worse than its European peers.】

item.title: 特鲁斯时刻 "仍令各国政府胆战心惊。下一个是法国吗？
item.description:
两年后，英国的表现并不差。但债券市场向世界表明，它们可以推翻财政上不谨慎的领导人。【原文：

Two years later, Britain isn’t doing so badly. But bond markets showed the world they can topple fiscally imprudent leaders.  

】

item.title: 交易员，不要爱上你的机器
item.description:
金融业正急于使用快速发展的人工智能工具。 随着机器变得越来越智能，风险也变得越来越古怪。【原文：

Finance is rushing to use rapidly evolving AI tools. As the machines get smarter, the risks get weirder.

】

item.title: 印度市场平静掩盖下的混乱与对印度央行降息的押注
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 中国庞大的钢铁行业正面临破产潮
item.description: 据彭博社报道，中国的钢铁危机正在为一波破产浪潮埋下伏笔，并加速行业亟需的整合。【原文：China’s steel crisis is setting the stage for a wave of bankruptcies and speeding a much-needed consolidation of the industry, according to Bloomberg Intelligence.】

item.title: 评级上调，业绩强劲，美团计划发行美元债券
item.description: 中国餐饮外卖巨头美团在一份文件中称，该公司正计划发行美元债券，为其海外债务再融资。【原文：Chinese food delivery giant Meituan is planning to issue dollar bonds to refinance its offshore debt, the company said in a filing.】

item.title: Kepco 拒绝提高电价后股价暴跌
item.description: 韩国电力公司（Korea Electric Power Corp. ）股价创下自去年年初以来的最大跌幅，原因是该公司拒绝提高电费，这将给公用事业带来更大的财务压力。【原文：Korea Electric Power Corp. shares headed for their biggest loss since early last year after it refrained from raising power charges, threatening more financial strain at the utility.】

item.title: 巴里托可再生能源公司称股权无重大变化
item.description: PT Barito Renewables Energy称，自2023年10月上市以来，主要股东的股权没有发生重大变化。【原文：PT Barito Renewables Energy said there has been no significant changes to major shareholders’ stakes since its October 2023 listing, commenting after FTSE Russell cited a concentration in holdings as a reason for its index removal.】

item.title: 新加坡交易所瞄准迪拜扩张，追随对冲基金的脚步
item.description: 受落户阿联酋的对冲基金激增的吸引，新加坡交易所有限公司正考虑进军迪拜。【原文：Singapore Exchange Ltd. is looking at expanding into Dubai, drawn by the surge of hedge funds that have settled in the United Arab Emirates.】

item.title: 尽管降息，香港周末成屋销售仍降至八周低点
item.description: 在香港银行降低借贷成本几天后，周末的销售额降至两个月来的最低点，利率下调尚未刺激香港房地产市场复苏。【原文：Lower interest rates have yet to spur a recovery in Hong Kong’s property market as weekend sales dropped to the lowest in two months, days after banks in the city reduced borrowing costs.】

item.title: 左翼候选人赢得总统职位，斯里兰卡债券暴跌
item.description: 左派候选人阿努拉-库马拉-迪萨纳亚克（Anura Kumara Dissanayake）在周末的总统选举中获胜后，斯里兰卡的美元债券下滑。【原文：Sri Lanka’s dollar bonds slid after leftist candidate Anura Kumara Dissanayake won the presidential election over the weekend.】

item.title: 在可能为美联储提供线索的数据公布前，黄金在纪录高位附近企稳
item.description: 黄金在创纪录附近企稳，预计即将公布的美国数据将为美联储上周降息50个基点是否会成为一系列激进降息行动的第一步提供线索。【原文：Gold steadied near a record, with upcoming US data expected to give clues on whether the Federal Reserve’s 50-basis-point rate reduction last week will be the first in a series of aggressive cuts.】

item.title: 林吉特可能创下五十年来最佳季度业绩，预示着更多涨幅
item.description: 马来西亚林吉特将迎来自 1973 年以来最好的一个季度，中央银行可能不会削减利率，这将延长马来西亚林吉特的涨势。【原文：The Malaysian ringgit is set for its best quarter since 1973, with a likely refrain by the central bank from cutting interest rates seen to extend the currency’s rally.】

item.title: 澳大利亚医疗诊断公司 Healius 以 6.57 亿美元将 Lumus 出售给 Affinity
item.description: Healius Ltd.同意以 9.65 亿澳元（6.57 亿美元）的价格将其 Lumus 成像部门出售给一家私募股权集团，这家亏损的澳大利亚医疗诊断公司将专注于病理业务。【原文：Healius Ltd. agreed to sell its Lumus imaging unit to a private equity group for A$965 million ($657 million), as the loss-making Australian medical diagnostics company focuses on its pathology business.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 美国准备禁止中国和俄罗斯的汽车技术斯里兰卡选举政治圈外人为总统。亚洲股市将下跌。以下是您今天需要了解的信息。【原文：US prepares ban on Chinese, Russian car technology. Sri Lanka elects political outsider as president. Asian stocks are set to fall. Here’s what you need to know today.】

item.title: 英国电信公司报告称，中银航空计划到 2030 年将机队规模扩大近一倍
item.description: 中银航空有限公司首席执行官史蒂文-汤恩德（Steven Townend）告诉当地报纸《商业时报》，公司计划到 2030 年将机队规模扩大到 1000 架。【原文：BOC Aviation Ltd. plans to grow its plane fleet to 1,000 by 2030, Chief Executive Officer Steven Townend told local paper The Business Times.】

item.title: 力拓董事长警告矿业交易无法解决供应危机
item.description: 力拓集团董事长多米尼克-巴顿（Dominic Barton）表示，世界需要更多的矿山来应对铜等关键能源转型金属需求的增长，因为兼并和收购无法填补迫在眉睫的供应缺口。【原文：The world needs more mines to cope with rising demand for key energy-transition metals like copper, as mergers and acquisitions will not plug a looming supply gap, Rio Tinto Group Chairman Dominic Barton said.】

item.title: 中东冲突加剧，油价周线收涨后保持稳定
item.description: 以色列与真主党之间的冲突升级成为关注焦点，石油在第二周上涨后持稳。【原文：Oil was steady after a second weekly gain, with the focus on an escalation in the conflict between Israel and Hezbollah.】

item.title: 默多克的 REA 再次将收购 Rightmove 的出价提高至 61 亿英镑
item.description: 在之前的出价遭到拒绝后，REA 集团有限公司将其对英国房地产门户网站 Rightmove Plc 的出价提高到 61 亿英镑（81 亿美元）。【原文：REA Group Ltd. sweetened its offer for UK property portal Rightmove Plc to £6.1 billion ($8.1 billion) after earlier bids were rejected.】

item.title: 梅赛德斯-奔驰的一场火灾可能为韩国的电动汽车转型蒙上阴影
item.description: 近几个月来，一辆奔驰电动汽车在韩国仁川市爆炸起火，加剧了公众对电池驱动汽车安全性的担忧。【原文：A Mercedes-Benz electric vehicle that burst into flames in the South Korean city of Incheon has fueled public fear over the safety of battery-powered cars in recent months.】

item.title: 中国困境加剧，亚洲股市有望下跌：市场综述
item.description: 由于对中国经济健康状况的担忧加剧，亚洲股市周一早盘将下跌。美国股票期货持稳。【原文：Asian stocks are poised to fall early Monday as concerns over the health of the Chinese economy grow. US equity futures were steady.】
